title: freezing
body:
I'm actually freezing all the time during the game . 

Using windows xp sp3 and updating windows is not a possible solution right now
I've tried setting high priority , lowing details , closing anti virus etc nothin seems to work there. 
Someone HULP. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Do you have any more details on the issue? There is a wide spectrum of possible causes, but if you can break down into a bit more detail, I'll be able to assist you further.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dAs068gT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-09T15:29:59.796+0000)
>
> Do you have any more details on the issue? There is a wide spectrum of possible causes, but if you can break down into a bit more detail, I'll be able to assist you further.

I'm having an issue. I queue into a 5v5 normal game. I accept the Accept or Decline timer. I'm Unable to see any messages on the champ select chat, I can't lock in a champion, I can't change summoner spells, masteries or runes. When the 0 mark reaches my client freezes on zero and I'm forced to close champ select. If I quit before the 0 I get a dodge timer and if I leave it I'm forced into a game with no idea what lane I'm in, what summoner spells ect ect. It's very annoying because if I dodge again my timer will be 30 minutes and I really don't want to wait 30 minutes for a game. Could you please help me, redirect me to an existing support form or take my dodge penalties away.
